Phase <NN> Action Plan — <title>

  • **Phase:** see projects/<project>/phases/phase<NN>/phase_definition.md.
  • **Stage list:**
  • <stage> → projects/<project>/phases/phase<NN>/actions/<project>_phase<NN>_stage_<name>_action.md
  • **Objective:** <objective>
  • **Scope/files:** In: <scope>; Out: <out>.
  • **Dependencies:** <dependencies>
  • **Risks/assumptions:** <risks>
  • **Persona actions:** Default Reviewer/Sponsor → Project/Process Manager → Developer → QA Lead; add others as needed.
  • **Validation:** <validation>
  • **Rollback:** <rollback>
  • **Ready checklist:** <ready>
  • **Done checklist:** <done>
